targets.query:
// Devices list with health by down ports (admin up, oper down)
strings =
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp" and (r._field == "sysLocation" or r._field == "sysDescr"))
  |> group(columns: ["source","sysName","_field"])
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["source","sysName"])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["sysName","source"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["sysName","source","sysLocation","sysDescr"])

uptime =
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp" and r._field == "sysUpTime")
  |> group(columns: ["source","sysName"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with uptime_days: float(v: r._value) / 100.0 / 86400.0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["sysName","source","uptime_days"])

nx =
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "if_status_errors" and (r._field == "ifAdminStatus" or r._field == "ifOperStatus"))
  |> group(columns: ["source","sysName","ifName"])
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["source","sysName","ifName"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with issue: if int(v: r.ifAdminStatus) == 1 and int(v: r.ifOperStatus) != 1 then 1.0 else 0.0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["source","sysName","issue"])

aruba =
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "interface_legacy" and (r._field == "ifAdminStatus" or r._field == "ifOperStatus"))
  |> group(columns: ["source","sysName","ifDescr"])
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["source","sysName","ifDescr"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with issue: if int(v: r.ifAdminStatus) == 1 and int(v: r.ifOperStatus) != 1 then 1.0 else 0.0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["source","sysName","issue"])

issues =
union(tables: [nx, aruba])
  |> group(columns: ["source","sysName"])
  |> sum(column: "issue")
  |> rename(columns: {issue: "down_ports"})

base = join(tables: {a: strings, b: uptime}, on: ["sysName","source"], method: "inner")

zeros = base |> keep(columns: ["source","sysName"]) |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with down_ports: 0.0 }))

down_all = union(tables: [zeros, issues]) |> group(columns: ["source","sysName"]) |> max(column: "down_ports")

join(tables: {a: base, b: down_all}, on: ["sysName","source"], method: "inner")
  |> rename(columns: {sysName: "name", source: "ip", sysLocation: "location", sysDescr: "description"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with health_score: if r.down_ports > 0.0 then 1.0 else 0.0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["ip","description","location","name","uptime_days","down_ports","health_score"])
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["ip"])

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "interface" and (r._field == "ifHCInBroadcastPkts" or r._field == "ifHCOutBroadcastPkts"))
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["_time","sysName","source"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["sysName","source"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["sysName","source","_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {source: "ip", _value: "broadcast_pps"})
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["broadcast_pps"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 10)

// iface vs pps for selected ip
ipFilter = "${ip}"
passAll  = ipFilter == "" or ipFilter == "*"

speeds = from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (passAll or r.source == ipFilter) and r._measurement == "interface" and r._field == "ifHighSpeed")
  |> group(columns: ["source","sysName","ifName"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with iface: r.ifName, speed_mbps: float(v: r._value) }))
  |> keep(columns: ["source","sysName","iface","speed_mbps"])

activity = from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (passAll or r.source == ipFilter) and r._measurement == "interface" and (r._field == "ifHCInUcastPkts" or r._field == "ifHCOutUcastPkts"))
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["_time","source","sysName","ifName"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["source","sysName","ifName"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with iface: r.ifName, pps: float(v: r._value) }))
  |> keep(columns: ["source","sysName","iface","pps"])

pps_zero = speeds |> keep(columns: ["source","sysName","iface"]) |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with pps: 0.0 }))

pps_all = union(tables: [pps_zero, activity]) |> group(columns: ["source","sysName","iface"]) |> max(column: "pps")

join(tables: {a: speeds, b: pps_all}, on: ["source","sysName","iface"], method: "inner")
  |> keep(columns: ["iface","pps"])
  |> sort(columns: ["pps"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 30)
